name: detailnet/dfw-persistence-module
description: Zend Framework Module for Doctrine based persistence

suggest.detailnet/dfw-commanding: For usage of the Doctrine ORM/ODM based repositories
suggest.detailnet/dfw-filtering: For usage of the Doctrine ORM/ODM based repositories
suggest.zendframework/zend-paginator: For usage of the Doctrine ORM/ODM based repositories
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-module: For usage of the Doctrine/Zend Cache bridge
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-orm-module: For usage of the Doctrine ORM based repository
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-mongo-odm-module: For usage of the Doctrine ODM based repository
suggest.alcaeus/mongo-php-adapter: For usage of the Doctrine ODM based repository (until doctrine-mongo-odm is ported to ext-mongodb)
suggest.knplabs/doctrine-behaviors: For usage of the classes for translating Doctrine entities
suggest.ramsey/uuid: For usage of the Doctrine ODM "uuid" mapping type
